html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-11372024-10-25FIN
ActExcise Act, 2001
SubjectRegulations Amending the Excise Duties on Vaping Products Regulations
PrecisRegulations amending the EXCISE DUTIES ON VAPING PRODUCTS REGULATIONS in order to (1) facilitate the joining of the five new jurisdictions of New Brunswick, Manitoba, Prince Edward Island, Alberta and Yukon to the coordinated system; and (2) to set out transitional rules that specify when the additional vaping product duty for these five new jurisdictions is applicable.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0211 Publication Date: 2024-11-06
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations amending the EXCISE DUTIES ON VAPING PRODUCTS REGULATIONS in order to (1) facilitate the joining of the five new jurisdictions of New Brunswick, Manitoba, Prince Edward Island, Alberta and Yukon to the coordinated system; and (2) to set out transitional rules that specify when the additional vaping product duty for these five new jurisdictions is applicable.
